policy_text: Privacy Policy Frigidaire Use Website In a Mode Accessibility Guide , Feedback , and Issue Reporting Skip to Content Skip to Menu Skip to Footer Frigidaire r Privacy Statement and Disclosure Effective Date December , Last April , Your privacy is important to us . This Privacy Statement and Disclosure describes the types of information Frigidaire collects when you visit our website , use our mobile applications or appliances , or otherwise interact with our brands . This Privacy Statement also explains how Frigidaire may use and disclose such information , and your ability to control certain uses of it . Your Right to Know Your Right to Delete Your Right to Correct How to submit a Consumer Data Request Your Right to Appeal Your Right to Your Right to Changes to our privacy notice Our contact information YOUR RIGHT TO KNOWYou have the right to request access to the personal information about you that Frigidaire has collected , used , disclosed , and sold in the last months . We collect personal information , which means information that identifies , relates to , or could reasonably be linked , directly or indirectly , with you or your household . We do not sell or share any of your personal information in exchange for the last months , as you interact with us , directly , through third parties , or online , we may collect and disclose the following categories of personal information . Identifiers Name , address , email address , phone number , or other similar collect this information when you provide it to us by registering your product , setting up your connected appliance , requesting service , submitting a rebate form , entering a sweepstakes , creating an online account , or otherwise interacting with us . We may also purchase such information from third parties . We use this information to offer or provide products , services or information about your product , administer promotions , improve our products and services , and for our internal operations purposes . This information may be shared with our service providers such as product technicians , logistics providers , extended warranty providers , payment processors , financial service providers , digital and other marketing partners , email distribution service providers , consultants , and customer relationship management tool providers . . Commercial Information Including records of products or services purchased and usage or performance of those products or services , and product collect this information when you provide it to us by submitting a review , requesting service , entering a sweepstakes , registering your product , or using a connected appliance . We use this information to provide products , services or information at your request . We also use this information to provide additional information to you about your product , to administer promotions , to improve our products and services , and for our internal operations purposes . The categories of information identified above may be shared with our affiliates and service providers such as product servicers , logistics providers , extended warranty providers , payment processors , financial service providers , digital and other marketing partners , email distribution service providers , consultants , and customer relationship management tool providers . . Audio Recordings Including consumer service collect this information when you call our consumer service number . We use this information for training purposes and to improve our products and services . We share this information with our call center service providers and consultants . Frigidaire will retain this information for months . . Internet or Other Similar Network Activity Including browsing history , search history , and information regarding your interaction with our website , apps , or collect this information automatically from your devices when you use the Frigidaire website . We use this information to improve our products or services , provide website and app functionality , and offer relevant , targeted advertising . We share this information with digital and other marketing partners , consultants , and service does not knowingly collect the personal information of RIGHT TO REQUEST DELETION OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATIONYou have the right to request that Frigidaire delete any of your personal information collected or maintained by Frigidaire , as described below . Please note , as permitted by law , we may deny your deletion request to complete a transaction , detect security incidents , prevent fraudulent or illegal activities , identify and repair errors , comply with court rules or orders , laws and regulations , and for other solely internal and lawful RIGHT TO CORRECT YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATIONYou have the right to request that Frigidaire correct any of your personal information collected or maintained by Frigidaire . You may do so by submitting a Consumer Data Request as described below . SUBMITTING A CONSUMER DATA REQUEST You may submit a consumer data request for information , deletion or correction , by providing your name , address , email address , and other related information , here . Your request will be verified using information you provide in the request . If you call you will be asked to provide the same information requested on the form for verification purposes . We will only use personal information provided in the consumer data request to verify your identity or authority to make the request . We can not respond to your request if we can not verify your identity or authority to make the request . You may use an authorized agent to submit a request as authorized by applicable law or with proof of signed permission and confirmation of your will typically respond to your request within days , if we are able to verify your identity . While Frigidaire endeavors to fulfill all consumer data requests within this time frame , it will prioritize requests from consumers located in jurisdiction where it is legally required to respond and reserves the right to deny requests from consumers located in jurisdiction where it is not legally required to may only make a consumer data request to know information twice within a period . We do not charge a fee to process or respond to your consumer data request unless it is excessive , repetitive , or manifestly unfounded . If we determine that the request warrants a fee , we will tell you why we made that decision and provide you with a cost estimate before completing your request . We do not knowingly collect information of RIGHT TO APPEALIf you are not satisfied with our response to your consumer data request , you may appeal by emailing NAPrivacy . In your email , please state why you were not satisfied with our initial RIGHT TO do not share your information with third parties in exchange for money . We do share Internet or Other Similar Network Activity information in exchange for advertising assistance and other valuable services . Such sharing may be a sale even if no money is have the right to direct Frigidaire to stop sharing your Internet or Other Similar Network Activity information , and to refrain from doing so in the future , which is called the Right to . You may exercise your Right to by clicking Do Not Sell My Information RIGHT TO FOR THE EXERCISE OF A PRIVACY RIGHTWe will not discriminate against you for exercising any privacy rights . We will not Deny you goods or services . Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services , including through granting discounts or other benefits , or imposing penalties . Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services . Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services . We may offer financial incentives , as permitted by law , which can result in different prices , rates , or quality levels . Any such incentive will be reasonably related to your personal information value . We will provide a written description of the material terms of the incentive . Participation in a financial incentive requires your prior consent , which you may revoke at any TO OUR PRIVACY NOTICEFrigidaire may amend this privacy notice at our discretion and at any time . When we make changes to this privacy notice , we will post the updated notice on the website and app and update the notice effective date . Your continued use of our website or app following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such FOR MORE INFORMATIONIf you have any questions or comments about this notice , the ways in which Frigidaire collects and uses your information , your choices and rights regarding such use , please do not hesitate to contact us at Phone Data Request Click here to access the request form Email NAPrivacy Address Electrolux Home Products , Legal David Taylor , NC Please enable JavaScript to continue using this application . Accessibility Adjustments Reset Settings Statement Hide Interface Choose the right accessibility profile for you OFF ON Seizure Safe Profile Clear flashes reduces color This profile enables epileptic and seizure prone users to browse safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations . OFF ON Vision Impaired Profile Enhances website visuals This profile adjusts the website , so that it is accessible to the majority of visual impairments such as Degrading Eyesight , Tunnel Vision , Cataract , Glaucoma , and others . OFF ON ADHD Friendly Profile More focus fewer distractions This profile significantly reduces distractions , to help people with ADHD and Neurodevelopmental disorders browse , read , and focus on the essential elements of the website more easily . OFF ON Cognitive Disability Profile Assists with reading focusing This profile provides various assistive features to help users with cognitive disabilities such as Autism , Dyslexia , CVA , and others , to focus on the essential elements of the website more easily . OFF ON Keyboard Navigation Motor Use website with the keyboard This profile enables persons to operate the website using the keyboard Tab , , and the Enter keys . Users can also use shortcuts such as M menus , H headings , F forms , B buttons , and G graphics to jump to specific elements . Note This profile prompts automatically for keyboard users . OFF ON Blind Users Screen Reader Optimize website for This profile adjusts the website to be compatible with such as JAWS , NVDA , VoiceOver , and TalkBack . A is software that is installed on the blind user computer and smartphone , and websites should ensure compatibility with it . Note This profile prompts automatically to . Content Adjustments Content Scaling Default Readable Font Highlight Titles Highlight Links Text Magnifier Adjust Font Sizing Default Align Center Adjust Line Height Default Align Left Adjust Letter Spacing Default Align Right Color Adjustments Dark Contrast Light Contrast High Contrast High Saturation Adjust Text Colors Cancel Monochrome Adjust Title Colors Cancel Low Saturation Adjust Background Colors Cancel Orientation Adjustments Mute Sounds Hide Images Read Mode Reading Guide Useful Links Stop Animations Reading Mask Highlight Hover Highlight Focus Big Black Cursor Big White Cursor Keyboard Navigation Accessible Mode Screen Reader Adjustments Read Mode Processing the data , please give it a few seconds Privacy Preference CenterFrigidaire collects personal information such as the cookies stored on your browser , the advertising identifier on your mobile device , or the IP address of your device when you visit our site . We , and our partners , use this information to tailor and deliver ads to you on our site or app , or to help tailor ads to you when you visit others sites or use others apps . To tailor ads that may be more relevant to you , we may share the information we collect with third parties . If you do not wish for us to provide your personal information to third parties for advertising purposes , you can adjust your preferences here . More information Manage Consent PreferencesThese cookies are necessary for the website to function and can not be switched off in our systems . They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services , such as setting your privacy preferences , logging in or filling in forms . You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies , but some parts of the site will not then work . These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information . Targeting Cookies These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners . They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites . They do not store directly personal information , but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device . If you do not allow these cookies , you will experience less targeted are typically first party cookies that enable the web site to provide enhanced functionality and personalization . They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages and may remain in your browser until you delete them , or they are otherwise removed upon expiration . If you block or do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly . Interest Based Advertising Cookies These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners . They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests for use in providing tailored advertising . They do not store directly personal identifiable information , but are based on uniquely identifying your browser , and internet device , and activity on our website . If you do not allow these cookies , you will experience less personalized advertising . These essential cookies are necessary for the website to function properly . They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services , such as setting your privacy preferences , logging in or filling in forms . You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies , but some parts of the site will not work properly . These cookies do not store any personally identifiable use Google Analytics and Contentsquare , which give us aggregated insights into how our websites are used . The data consists of . which pages were viewed , which links were clicked on , for how long pages were viewed , products that were viewed and purchased , and what devices were used . We use the data to help us understand how people use our website and to ensure that it functions correctly . We use Google Optimize to perform design experiments on the site , where different design variations are shown to different groups of users . We monitor the results of these experiments and we see which variations produce the best experience . We use Qualtrics to invite you to optionally provide additional qualitative feedback about the site , which we use to improve site design and ensure the best possible customer experience . We do not use the above mentioned data for marketing or advertising purposes or share it with other third cookies allow us to count visits and monitor traffic sources so we can measure , experiment and improve the performance of our web site . For example , these cookies help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site . The information these cookies collect does not contain directly identifiable information about you , rather they collect information about your browser , device and sometimes a macro location . This information is not shared with any other companies and is only used by us to improve your online experience . If you block or do not allow these cookies , then we will not be able to monitor the web site performance and improve the online Cookies Search IconConsent Switch Label label Switch Label label Switch Label label
